title: Director of AI Engineering
description:
Are you passionate about Machine Learning and AI? Do you have the expertise to lead and inspire a high-performing enterprise AI team, whilst imparting deep and up-to-date technical hands on coding expertise in applied AI ? AstraZeneca is looking for an experienced Director of AI Engineering to join our dynamic team focused on using advanced technologies to solve high-impact strategic challenges in support of AstraZeneca's 2030 ambitions. If you are ready to make a real difference and drive innovation in a company committed to turning ideas into life-changing medicines, this might be the perfect opportunity for you.

**About the Role –** **Director of AI Engineering**


As the Director of AI Engineering, you will lead a team of AI Engineers in Gothenburg, collaborating deeply with product teams, product managers, and designers to build state-of-the-art reusable AI services and assets. These solutions will help accelerate our business outcomes and drive innovation across AstraZeneca. You will work closely with AI engineering product groups to integrate the latest features and capabilities, ensuring our AI solutions are at the forefront of technological advancements.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Team** **and technical l****eadership**: Inspire and manage a team of AI Engineers, fostering growth and career development whilst imparting deep and up-to-date technical expertise in applied AI. Be as comfortable sourcing and defining projects as you are hands on team member code, proactively ensuring the highest engineering and software standards in the AI products that you build.
* **Collaboration**: Work closely with product teams, leaders, and architecture teams to deliver AI solutions grounded in consistent, repeatable enterprise patterns and practices.
* **Innovation**: Stay up-to-date and informed about the rapidly evolving AI landscape, integrating new algorithmic advancements into our solutions.
* **Problem Solving**: Represent the AI engineering team, unblocking issues and driving alignment with senior management.
* **Delivery**: Lead the planning and execution of key AI deliverables, structuring and streamlining delivery patterns across the Reusable AI Services portfolio.
* **Stakeholder Engagement**: Develop effective relationships with senior stakeholders to ensure optimal utilization of resources and services.
* **Technical Excellence**: Promote best practices in agile AI product development, software engineering, and model research. Define and implement golden-path standards and lead deep-expertise into one or more AI sub-domains (such as optimisation, language, muti-modal, prediction, deployment).
**Essential Skills/Experience:**

* Background as a senior AI engineer with significant experience in leading agile AI products and services.
* Bsc/MSc/Ph.D degree in Computer Science or related quantitative field
* Experience leading and managing junior and mid-level colleagues, delivering technical workshops and providing advanced technical mentorship.
* Experience in planning and executing complex AI projects within high-performing engineering teams.
* Ability to translate customer demands into detailed and actionable software briefs.
* Experience with regulatory or compliance settings, appreciating the documentation and diligence required for ethical AI.
* Expertise in developing machine learning models using cloud platforms, building APIs, and deploying web services.
* Advanced software development skills in Python and familiarity with database systems (e.g., SQL, NoSQL, graph).
* Proven leadership in software development best practices (software architecting, linting, CI/CD, unit tests, OOP, Git).
* Strong understanding of algorithm design, development, optimisation, and scaling.
* Excellent communication, business analysis, and consultancy skills, with the ability to work with various senior business and technical stakeholders.
* Passion for advising on best-in-class delivery patterns that enable AI developers to do their best work.
* Strong bias for action and results.
**What We Offer:**

* Opportunity to lead a high-impact AI team at AstraZeneca, making a real difference in healthcare.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment with access to cutting-edge AI technologies.
* Professional growth and career development opportunities.
* Competitive compensation and benefits package.

Are you ready to shape the future of AI at AstraZeneca? Apply now to join us on this exciting journey!
company_description: Build unrivalled capabilities in a place that promotes learning agility and offers development opportunities. We never standstill so you’ll have the chance to constantly grow your abilities.

title: Manufacturing Engineer
Delivery Lead
description:
Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch’s Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
  
Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
  
At Sinch we “Dream Big”, “Win Together”, “Keep it simple”, and “Make it Happen”. These values are our foundation!
  
Description
  
As Delivery Lead you will own and ensure cross team and cross domain deliveries. You will have the overview perspective and own the progress and all project related communication and planning.
  
  

**As Delivery Lead you will:**  

Work closely with stakeholders across Engineering, Product, Operations, and Infrastructure to plan and coordinate software projects with high quality and at speed.
  
On a daily basis provide direction and guidance of scaled agile practices across multiple teams and continuously focus on improving and maintaining deliveries across teams.
  
Take care of the overall milestone planning, execution, delivery and release of our largest and most complex Engineering cross-team initiatives and projects.
  
Effectively monitor project progress and present project updates and status to relevant stakeholders and project team members.
  
Identify, diagnose and remove cross-team impediments so teams can deliver.
  
Set up, implement and evolve cross-product line processes for managing initiatives, projects and dependencies with optimal output and progress whilst keeping autonomy in the product teams.
  
  

Requirements
  
We are looking for a person who is great at leading deliverables in an agile environment – not through reporting lines or “owning resources” but by creating trust, structure, overview and through enabling good collaboration and communications. You instill energy in the people you work with and have a knack for building report with both technical and non-technical colleagues, at all levels. You don’t accept the status quo and welcome challenges to change and improve. You easily grasp the technical details from the holistic company-wide perspective.
  
At least a few years of relevant background from software organizations such as Delivery Lead, Project Manager, Engineering Manager, Entrepreneur, Scrum Master or Agile Coach
  
Experience with Agile methodologies e.g., Kanban, Scrum, Agile
  
Excellent communication and presentation skills in English - both verbal and written.
  
  

Our Hiring Process
  
We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
  
We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/.
  
No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Senior Citrix specialist till SEB
description:
OM FÖRETAGET
  
SEB är en ledande nordeuropeisk finansiell koncern med internationell räckvidd.
  
ARBETSUPPGIFTERI denna roll kommer du att vara aktivt involverad i den dagliga driften, livscykelhantering och kundens resa mot Citrix Cloud, där du bidrar till utvecklingen och förbättringen av Citrix-tjänster.
  
ERFARENHETER OCH EGENSKAPER Du är en senior Citrix-specialist med dokumenterad erfarenhet av att designa, bygga och underhålla komplexa Citrix-miljöer.
  
Du har gedigen kunskap om Citrix Cloud och Azure/Entra ID-implementationer.
  
Du har erfarenhet av att implementera Citrix DaaS & SPA.
  
Du har kunskap om Microsoft Windows Server & Client OS.
  
Du har erfarenhet av integration och implementering av Citrix Cloud & Microsoft W365/AVD.
  
Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av Ivanti Desktop NOW (tidigare AppSense).
  
Du är en lagspelare med erfarenhet av att driva aktiviteter.
  
Du har ett naturligt förhållningssätt till dokumentation, struktur och kunskapsdelning.
  
Du har goda sociala färdigheter.
  
ÖVRIGT
  
**Start:** omgående
  
**Slutdatum:** 2026-08-28
  
**Plats:** Stockholm (SEB har en policy om att arbeta 3 dagar på plats per vecka och 2 dagar på distans)
  
OM D-SOURCE
  
Your source to IT D-Source är ett modernt konsultbolag med bredden mellan helpdesk, infrastruktur och Tech. Vi har lång erfarenhet av att förstå kunders IT-behov! Tveka inte att höra av dig om du är intresserad av att ta reda på mer.
  
Vad kan vi göra för dig och vad kan vi göra tillsammans?
  
INGET JOBB FÖR DIG?
  
Lugnt! Du kan alltid registrera dig förutsättningslöst på D-Source jobbsida genom att Connecta med oss. Då hamnar du i vår kandidatdatabas och får koll på våra kommande aktuella tjänster.

title: Specialist in Mobile Device Software Testing
description:
The job description of a Specialist in Mobile Device Software Testing is quite comprehensive and involves a wide range of responsibilities related to testing software and hardware components. Here's a breakdown of the key responsibilities and tasks mentioned in the job description:
  
•
  
**Test Strategy and Planning:** Defining qualification strategies and executing functionality, compatibility, integration, and reliability testing for complex software applications across multiple platforms, including mobile, desktop, web, and cloud client/server ecosystems.
  
•
  
**Performance Testing:** Designing and executing performance tests, including the development of performance test plans and strategies. This includes generating large datasets and simulating traffic to evaluate and test applications according to industry best practices.
  
•
  
**Testing & Validation:** ). Responsible for conducting various types of testing, including Performance Testing, Functional Testing, Stability Testing, Network Testing (across different generations such as 5G, 4G, 3G, IMS, Vo Wifi), Interoperability Testing, Operator Testing, IOT & Smart Device Testing, Certification (GCF GMS), Compliance & Pre-Compliance Testing, Consumer Trials, Compatibility Testing, Usability Testing, Security Testing, and Automation Testing.
  
•
  
**End-to-End Responsibility:** Ensuring that 4G and 5G products comply 100% with the customer's network design. This involves various components such as 4G DU, 5G RU, 5G DU, CBRS RRHs, DCM, LSM, vLSM, USM, vDCM, and vCU.
  
•
  
**5G Device Testing:** Executing 5G device test solutions, from early chipset development to conformance and carrier acceptance testing. This involves ensuring interoperability and reliable functioning of 5G devices.
  
•
  
**5G NR Testing:** Conducting testing and research and development support related to 5G NR technology, covering Performance, Functionality, Usability, and Communication Protocols.
  
•
  
**Gps Testing:** EM (Emergency) call testing using satellite technology.
  
•
  
**LTE Testing:** Performing testing and validation of LTE basics, physical, logical, and transport channels, as well as various LTE features and call flows, including VOLTE and SIP.
  
•
  
**Interoperability Testing:** Ensure that network equipment and devices can work seamlessly together.
  
•
  
**KPI Development:** Responsible for 4G/5G Key Performance Indicator (KPI) development, field integration/first application test plan development, feature requirements, and performance analysis. Performing functional and KPI testing for various technologies, including LTE, IMS, RAN, FDD-TDD, VoLTE, and VoWiFi
  
•
  
**Error Verification Testing:** Conducting error verification testing, FOTA (Firmware Over-The-Air), Sanity, Stress, and stability testing.
  
•
  
**Real-Time Network Analysis:** Conducting expert-level analysis on real-time network issues to identify and resolve problems.
  
•
  
**Reporting and Documentation:** Preparing detailed reports and updating results for issue tracking.
  
•
  
**Bugs Detection:** Proven skills in detecting and regression testing for software bugs.
  
•
  
**iOS Application Testing:** Perform comprehensive testing of iOS applications, including functional, compatibility, and usability testing.

title: Azure/Microsoft 365-konsult med fokus på säkerhet
description:
Vill du vara en del i att hjälpa vårt samhälle till en cybersäkrare tillvaro? Just nu söker vi dig som har kompetens inom Azure/Microsoft 365 med tonvikt på infrastruktur och säkerhet.
  
Vilka är vi?
  
Vi människor har ett behov av att känna trygghet oavsett om vi befinner oss i den fysiska eller digitala världen. Lika trygga som vi vill känna oss i en mörk gränd om kvällen vill vi vara när vi klickar hem en vara online eller kanske delar känslig information med kollegor. Trots detta hamnar säkerhet förvånansvärt långt ner på priolistan i de flesta digitaliseringsprojekt.
  
Det vill vi på Dizparc ändra på.
  
Hos oss tror vi på att göra digital säkerhet enkel och tillgänglig för alla, oavsett storlek eller plånbok. Det gör vi genom att skapa en robust grund som bygger värde över tid och andas klass och kvalitet. Vi skyddar våra kunder från säkerhetsintrång, vi reducerar digitala affärsrisker och frigör tid så att våra kunder istället kan investera i deras fortsatta digitaliseringsresa!
  
Vi har den trevliga arbetsplatsen där alla är och känner sig viktiga samt bidrar med sin unika kompetens och vågar tänka och göra annorlunda. Då vi inte tror på starka hierarkier så har vi skapat en jämlik organisation med en hälsosam miljö för debatt och åsiktsutbyte som skapar dynamik och främjar vår utveckling. Vår organisation är transparent och alla har insyn i hur företaget drivs och kan på så sätt vara med och påverka vår gemensamma framtid.
  
Vem är du?
  
Vi tror att du har ett brinnande intresse för cybersäkerhet!
  
Du har minst 3 års erfarenhet av att har jobbat som administratör av M365/Azure. Vi tror att du är en driven och engagerad person som gillar att skapa värde för kunden och utmana dig själv. Men viktigast är ditt brinnande cybersäkerhetsintresse!
  
Vad ska du göra?
  
I rollen som Microsoft 365-konsult kommer du agera både rådgivare och utförare i arbetet med att öka våra kunders säkerhet inom Microsoft 365. Du kommer på egen hand ansvara för och driva olika initiativ mot kund, men även vara del i team där vi tillsammans löser våra kunders utmaningar.
  
Arbetsuppgifter
  
Hjälpa kunder med rekommendationer och prioriteringar hur de kan förbättra sin säkerhet över tid
  
Implementera lösningar
  
Rådgivning och konsulting
  
Arkitekt- och designarbete
  
  

Tidigare erfarenheter
  
Erfarenhet av M365 Security platform
  
Erfarenhet inom Entra ID
  
  

**Meriterande är:**  

Kunskap inom Microsoft 365 Defender och Microsoft Sentinel
  
Kompetens inom Entra ID Premium-funktioner, såsom MFA och Conditional Access.
  
Erfarenhet av MS Intune.
  
Windows Server (migrering, uppdatering och konfiguration)
  
Windows infrastruktur (Active Directory, Entra ID, GPO, DNS)
  
Hybrida IT-miljöer (On-Prem & Cloud)
  
Kunskap inom Powershell.
  
  

Placeringsort
  
Umeå
  
Språkkunskaper
  
Svenska och engelska flytande

title: Cloud Migration Project Manager to SEB in Solna
description:
SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.
  
  

SEB is in the midst of a cloud transformation, migrating key IT infrastructure components to a modern cloud environment. We’re looking for a skilled Project Manager to lead this transformation and ensure successful implementation.
  
As the banking sector transforms with new technologies and regulations, SEB is evolving to become an IT-driven business. We embrace agile development to deliver fast, customer-focused solutions. This transition to cloud-based solutions requires a deep understanding of both on-premises requirements and cloud possibilities, with a strong focus on security and accessibility
  
  

Role description
  
As Cloud Migration Project Manager, you will lead the migration for Development Solution & Infrastructure, working with IT stakeholders to define the scope, manage progress, and ensure alignment with business goals. You will coordinate teams and drive the cloud migration process to completion.
  
To thrive in this role, we believe you have a broad IT experience, spanning both on-prem based infrastructure and a good understanding of the cloud-based prerequisites for IT infrastructure. We also believe that you have experience in different project management methods and tools and that you have a hybrid delivery perspective mixing long term planning with an agile approach.
  
The main objective will be to define and set scope for DSI’s Cloud migration journey. This is not limited to, but includes:
  
Define and drive the scope of the Cloud migration for the area Development Solution & Infrastructure within SEB
  
Analyze the current potential of cloud migration objects within Development Solution & Infrastructure
  
Cater and enable the migration together with the maintenance team of the object
  
Lead the work associated with the migration tasks
  
Report progress to a steering committee
  
Document decisions and execute them as needed
  
  

Requirements
  
Extensive experience in IT infrastructure, including both on-prem and cloud solutions.
  
Track record of delivering on large scale cloud or infrastructure projects
  
Comfortable to discuss and influence IT architecture
  
Self-going and self-managed
  
Strong experience in leading cloud migration projects with specialized teams and navigate diverse perspectives.
  
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to foster collaboration across teams and stakeholders.
  
Fluent in both English and Swedish
  
  

**What we offer:**  

Extensive training and learning opportunities.
  
Access to SEB staff banking and exclusive benefits.
  
A prestigious team with experienced colleagues who value cooperation and openness.
  
Opportunity to share knowledge by pair programming, demos, etc.
  
A workplace where we care about the work-life balance.
  
An innovative company at the forefront of technology
  
Hybrid Workplace Setup
  
Extensive training and learning opportunities.
  
  

Do you want to be part of SEB?
  
Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
  
Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 30th of April 2025.
  
**Learn more about working at SEB here:** www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
  
It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Citrix Specialist
description:
Om oss
  
Välkommen till Everlight och framtidens konsultuppdrag med dig och din karriär i fokus. Hos oss finns det inga hierarkier att bestiga eller höga hästar att rida. Hos oss finns det däremot en hel plattform av möjligheter och oändliga karriärvägar att vandra. Här finns drivna och ambitiösa kollegor, stöd och bollplank att vända sig till och framförallt finns det glädje och transparens!
  
Oavsett om våra vägar flätas samman vid just detta uppdrag eller inte så ser vi ram emot att få connecta med dig som är redo att ta ett kliv vidare i karriären. Vi får ständigt in spännande kunduppdrag och vår vision är att hitta något passande för just dig i den riktningen du vill styra din karriär.
  
  

Om uppdraget
  
Till en av våra kunder söker vi nu en Citrixspecialst till ett spännande projekt inom Finans.
  
  

**Om uppdraget:**  

Som Senior Citrix-specialist kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i kundens Citrix-team i Stockholm. För att upprätthålla en hög och kontinuerlig servicenivå, säkerställa effektiv livscykelhantering och stödja prioriterade initiativ, söker kunden nu förstärkning till teamet.
  
I denna roll kommer du att vara aktivt involverad i daglig drift, livscykelhanteringsaktiviteter samt kundens Citrix Cloud-resa, där du bidrar till utvecklingen och förbättringen av Citrix-tjänster.
  
  

**Krav:**  

* Senior Citrix-specialist med dokumenterad erfarenhet av att designa, bygga och underhålla komplexa Citrix-miljöer
* Stark kunskap om Citrix Cloud och Azure/Entra ID-implementationer
* Erfarenhet av Citrix DaaS & SPA-implementationer
* Kunskap om Microsoft Windows Server & Client OS
* Erfarenhet av integration/implementering av Citrix Cloud & Microsoft W365/AVD


**Meriterande kvalifikationer:**  

* Erfarenhet av Ivanti Desktop NOW (tidigare AppSense)


**Personliga egenskaper:**  

* En lagspelare med erfarenhet av att driva aktiviteter framåt
* Strukturerad och dokumentationsvan med en naturlig inställning till kunskapsdelning
* Goda interpersonella färdigheter


Placering och omfattning
  
Uppdragsperiod ASAP till Q2 2026 med möjlighet till förlängning.
  
Placering i huvudsak på kundens kontor i Stockholm/Solna med viss möjlighet till distansarbete. Dagar och tider styrs utifrån organisationens behov.
  
Sista dag för ansöka 2025-03-24.
  
Vi går igenom ansökningar löpande och återkommer så snart som möjligt!

title: Cloud Architect
description:
What will you be doing?
  
The bridge between Cloud and R&D activities.
  
Our cloud-focused team is growing! Today, we are a team of about 8 people focusing on cloud solutions, primarily Azure and AWS. The team consists of a mix of experienced specialists and architects, as well as driven developers. The immediate manager will be Joakim, based in Stockholm, Kista, but team members are also located in other parts of the country. You will influence how we develop our cloud business going forward. Remote work generally works well for this type of role, which is why we also hire people from other parts of Sweden.
  
  

**Who are you? You are passionate about and have experience in:**  

Minimum 3-4 years of experience of working with cloud
  
Need to have experience with cloud from a couple of projects, primarily Azure
  
Need to be certified in Azure, at least admin associate
  
Need to have experience in both cloud architecture and hands-on cloud intrastructure implementation
  
  

**You also have:**  

Excellent communication skills
  
fluent in Swedish, both verbal and written
  
An interest in working both holistically and hands-on
  
  

We value personal qualities, communicative skills and social competence. This gives us flexible teams and a great company culture where we all work well together and feel the support from our peer.
  
About us
  
Knowit offers a chance to achieve professional goals through challenging tasks and positive leadership. Working with customers at Knowit Connectivity provides opportunities to develop skills while enjoying the job. The workplace is fast-paced, fun, and inspiring with a great team spirit that works towards making a difference for the company and customers. There are many chances for personal development through innovative projects and skill development models. Knowit's corporate culture values sustainability and is built on consensus, openness, honesty, and respect for individual value and dignity. Knowit Connectivity specializes in exciting areas such as self-driving cars, infotainment systems, and 5G development, with expertise in embedded, cloud, and application domains.
  
Application
  
We have an ongoing selection of application, so please apply for the position as soon as possible! Please include at least 3 cloud projects you have worked in you CV.

title: Google Cloud Platform Engineer | SEB, Solna
description:
SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.
  
Join SEB’s Cloud Tribe and help shape the future of scalable, secure, and innovative products by advancing Public Cloud technologies. Take on this exciting challenge and make a real impact!

As a Cloud Engineer within our Cloud Tribe, you will join a team of 25 highly engaged peers using new technology to develop and maintain services on top of Public Cloud Platforms catering for the platform’s technical Governance & Compliance. Work closely with operations, maintenance, and security of the platform. Our delivery includes guardrails, best practices, and supporting functionalities, all of which are paving the way for SEB’s developers to create a modern bank in the Clouds.
  
As part of the Cloud Core Platforms, we offer a unique opportunity to be part of building the foundation of a paradigm change in banking. Being part of a multi-cloud tribe you will have the opportunity to gain skill and experience in multiple Public Cloud environments.
  
  

**To thrive in this position, we believe you have:**  

* Hands on experience with Google Cloud.
* Understanding other Cloud Platforms such as AWS and Azure.

* Experience with TypeScript, Bash and Python.

title: Head of Legal to Spiideo
description:
Spiideo is a global leader in automated, cloud-based solutions for sports video analysis and streaming, headquartered in the heart of Malmö. Our customers are sport clubs, leagues and media companies all over the globe. As part of our growth journey, we are now looking to strengthening our team at the Lilla Torg office in Malmö with a highly skilled Head of Legal!
  
  

About the role
  
In the role of Head of Legal, you will be supporting the organization with a wide range of legal matters, with a special focus on our customer contracts and product terms and conditions. In this newly established role, you will have the unique opportunity to play an intrinsic part in our growth journey and be part of developing the legal function and establishing new routines and processes. You will be the first Head of Legal and work closely with both the product development organization as well as the sales and marketing teams. You will report to the CEO and work with colleagues and customers across the globe and be part of the management team.
  
  

**The role includes the following key responsibilities:**  

* Build and develop the legal function and map the company´s need for legal expertise;
* Provide legal advice on customer contracts, including redlining and negotiations;
* Provide legal advice on matters regarding patent law, corporate law, media and data rights;
* Act as the project leader for the legal workstream in M&A transactions and fundraisings, including being responsible for drafting, reviewing, and negotiating all relevant documents, collaborating with internal and external legal advisors and, when applicable, coordinating and overseeing the due diligence process, etc.;
* Develop and maintain a robust and competitive structure for our product terms and conditions and implement a platform to manage contracts, track versions, and ensure compliance;
* Ensure that all customer contracts are up-to-date and reflect the latest product developments;
* Work cross-functionally with Product and Commercial to ensure good and competitive legal solutions for new product releases: and
* Work closely with our CEO, CFO, external law firms and other stakeholders on company-related legal matters.


**Location:** Spiideo´s office at Lilla Torg 1 in Malmö with a short walking distance from the train station.
  
  

**Remote status:** Office first (Hybrid, minimum 3 days in Malmö office per week).
  
What we are looking for
  
We are looking for a qualified lawyer with a Master of Laws (LL.M) and around 15 years of experience as in-house counsel or both as an associate at a reputable law firm and in-house counsel. You have worked for a company within the tech industry and have had similar roles. You have experience working in an international environment and have extensive experience working with the American market. You have strong expertise in drafting and negotiating commercial contracts and more specifically, experience of working with SaaS agreements and products. Furthermore, you have experience of working with matters regarding corporate law, patent, M&A and media and data rights.
  
  

You have a great ability to develop and implement legal structures and processes. Preferably you have experience of being part of establishing a legal function. You are used to working independently and have excellent language skills in English, both orally and in writing.
  
  

To succeed in this role, you need to enjoy working in a rapidly changing and dynamic environment. You are a business-driven person with a proactive attitude and an excellent negotiator with a solution-oriented mindset. You are comfortable making decisions, and capable of providing clear guidance to the organization. You are a humble and positive team player who appreciates working across different functions.
  
What we offer you
  
We offer a collaborative, supportive environment with opportunities for professional growth. You will have the chance to make an impact in a growing, international SaaS company and be part of a friendly and skilled multinational team with people from many different nationalities and backgrounds.
  
  

We believe that when the best people work together in an open environment, magic happens. Working at Spiideo should be rewarding, fun, and developing yet challenging.
  
About Spiideo
  
Spiideo provides innovative solutions for automating sports video production, video analysis and streaming of all levels of sports - all over the world. The powerful cloud-based camera system uses AI to automatically capture high-quality, panoramic footage, enabling the delivery of high-quality analysis and feedback without manual filming.
  
  

Spiideo works globally with all levels of sports- from elite to amateur and senior to youth. Thousands of organizations are currently using Spiideo, including teams in the Premier League, NHL and NBA, as well as national leagues such as Sweden´s Allsvenskan.
  
  

Founded in Malmö in 2012, Spiideo has grown and scaled internationally, delivering products worldwide and with 100+ employees across 15 different countries. Alongside camera system development, customer success, sales and marketing, we have a complete product development organization in-house with high capacity in cloud, frontend, design, video and AI/ML.
  
Contact and Application
  
In this recruitment process, Spiideo is supported by Jurek Recruitment & Consulting. Please apply via www.jurek.se. We review new applications continuously. Kindly note that we do not accept applications by email.
  
  

For any questions, please contact Recruitment Consultant Linn Marthinussen by phone 076-002 69 41, or by email at linn.marthinussen@jurek.se

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Join us in creating world-class creativity software used by millions of people.**

  

At Appostrophe, we build SCRL, a leading design tool for photo editing and collage making. Our app is used by millions of people worldwide, and now we’re taking the next step — bringing SCRL to the web. We’re looking for a Senior Full Stack Engineer to help us build the web version of SCRL, while continuing to develop and refine our backend services.

 **About the role**  

You’ll be working on both the frontend and backend of our new web-based platform. Our mobile apps on iOS and Android are hugely successful, and now we’re expanding SCRL to the desktop with a browser-based version. This means tackling a range of challenges, from authentication and image storage, to building a powerful design editor in Javascript. You’ll play a key role in shaping the architecture and implementation of our web experiences, working across the entire stack.

 **What you will do**

  

* Develop and maintain our backend services, including authentication, accounts, and image storage, using Node.js and Postgres.
* Build the frontend of our new browser-based design editor, with a focus on a smooth and intuitive user experience.
* Collaborate closely with our mobile engineers and designers to create a great cross-platform experience.
* Take ownership of the services and help define the technical direction.

**What we’re looking for**

  

* Experience with Node.js and modern Javascript/TypeScript frameworks.
* Strong expertise in relational databases.
* Familiarity with Google Cloud, or equivalent cloud platforms.
* Experience building complex, user-facing web applications.
* Ability to work independently.

**We offer**

  

* A chance to work on a new product from the ground up, shaping the future of SCRL on the web.
* Freedom to be creative and test new ideas.
* The opportunity to build and ship a product to users across the world.
* Great colleagues and office in central Stockholm.
* Competitive salary and opportunities for professional development.


If you’re excited about working with both frontend and backend, building great user experiences, and shaping the future of creative tools on the web, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Business Development Representative - Stockholm
description:
Our Company
  
  

Changing the world through digital experiences is what Adobe’s all about. We give everyone—from emerging artists to global brands—everything they need to design and deliver exceptional digital experiences! We’re passionate about empowering people to create beautiful and powerful images, videos, and apps, and transform how companies interact with customers across every screen.
  
  

We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours!
  
  

The opportunity
  
From the moment you wake up in the morning, until you go to bed at night, consider the media you consume, the adverts you see, the apps you use, the websites you browse, and almost all of the shopping you do online throughout the day. Chances are that every single one of those interactions or experiences was touched by an Adobe product.
  
We have a phenomenal opportunity for a Business Development Representative (BDR) to join our Digital Experience teams in Stockholm, Sweden!
  
What you’ll do
  
As Business Development Representatives (BDR), you are responsible for helping your prospects re-imagine their customer experiences using Adobe solutions & in the process crafting new sales opportunities for your Account Executives (AEs).
  
You will anticipate and adapt to customers’ constantly evolving expectations with Adobe Experience Cloud.
  
Drive force for identifying and providing high-value opportunities into the Sales pipeline and the first line of relationship development with prospective high-value accounts.
  
Deliver a “consultative” approach to selling; taking time to understand the prospect’s business, their goals, objectives, and challenges before recommending a solution.
  
Consistently achieve quality pipeline & other metrics such as Inbound lead follow-up & outbound account engagement metrics.
  
Handle territory creation plan for your key account executives & their accounts.
  
Researching key accounts, identifying decision-makers, generating interest, and developing accounts to stimulate need.
  
Prospect, educate, qualify, and develop Target Accounts and inbound leads to build sales-ready leads and opportunities.
  
Quickly route prospects and current customers to appropriate colleagues to assist in solving problems and driving value. Nurtures & provides education on areas of interest for under-informed customers.
  
Setup, attend & run 1st level qualification meetings with customers prior to passing it on to relevant Account Executive & Solution Consultants.
  
Work collaboratively with Sales & Solution Consultant teams to further qualify and generate pipeline.
  
Updating CRM, Outreach, and other tools to ensure logging of key history & ensuring a smooth hand-off to the Account Executive.
  
Collaborate closely with the Marketing team to run and assist in performing lead generation campaigns and follow-up on leads.
  
Run outbound campaigns to ensure a balanced pipeline built across territories.
  
Providing closed-loop feedback to BDR organization to ensure continuous process optimization.
  
  

What you'll need to succeed
  
1+ years’ experience in Sales/Business Development in a SaaS context, ideally engaging with enterprise clients.
  
Confirmed sales skills delivering inbound & outbound experiences and building positive relationships at multiple levels within an organization.
  
Experience running all areas of the BDR process including account planning, pre-call preparation, opportunity qualification, and objection handling.
  
Self-starter with high motivation, independence, resilience, and ability to collaborate with sales & marketing teams.
  
Ability to quickly learn & understand sophisticated business problems & translate customers' needs into solution plays.
  
Proficient with standard corporate efficiency tools (email, voicemail, MS Office) and experience with sales tools such as Microsoft Dynamics, SFDC, Outreach, ZoomInfo, Lusha, etc.
  
Phenomenal teammate with ability to work well with multiple partners across sales, marketing & solution teams.
  
Full fluency in both Swedish and English are a must. Additional Nordic languages are a plus.
  
  

The BDR role opens up many doors within the broader Adobe ecosystem. There are opportunities to advance into sales, customer success, marketing, and many more.
  
  

As our many awards will tell you, at Adobe you’ll be immersed in an exceptional work environment that is recognized around the world. You’ll be surrounded by colleagues who are committed to helping each other grow through our outstanding Check-In approach where ongoing feedback flows freely. If you’re looking to make an impact, Adobe's the place for you. Discover what our employees are saying about their career experiences on the Adobe Life blog, Adobe Life and explore the extraordinary benefits we offer at Rewards.adobe.com.
  
Adobe is an equal opportunity employer. We hire dedicated individuals, regardless of gender, race or colour, ethnicity or national origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or veteran status. We know that when our employees feel appreciated and included, they can be more creative, innovative and successful. This is what it means to be Adobe For All.
  
We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are dedicated to crafting exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We realize that new insights can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours!
  
  

Adobe is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and affirmative action employer. We do not discriminate based on gender, race or color, ethnicity or national origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law. Learn more.
  
  

Adobe aims to make Adobe.com accessible to any and all users. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation to navigate our website or complete the application process, email accommodations@adobe.com or call (408) 536-3015.

company_description: Let's Create Experiences that Matter.

title: SAP application consultant till GBG & Malmö
description:
*På Implema får du inte bara möjlighet att utveckla våra erbjudanden utan också dig själv. Vi är stolta över vår starka gemenskap och unika företagskultur där samarbete, innovation och personlig utveckling står i fokus.*

#### **Om rollen**

Vi letar efter erfarna SAP-konsulter med expertis inom olika områden såsom SAP logistik, inköp, produktion, cloud, teknik, lager och/eller ekonomi. Erfarenhet av S/4HANA är meriterande. I denna roll blir du en viktig del av vårt SAP-team och arbetar nära våra kunder inom olika branscher för att förstå deras behov och leverera skräddarsydda lösningar som passar deras verksamhet. Du blir nyckelpersonen i transformationsprojekt och en naturlig del av kundens team, där du arbetar långsiktigt med affärsprocesser och förbättringar av SAP-lösningar. Vi arbetar med en bred variation av uppdrag, stora som små, och anpassar dem utifrån din expertis och dina intresseområden.


#### **Kvalifikationer**

* Erfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt eller applikationsexpert inom SAP, med fokus på områden som inköp, e-handel, retail, finans, logistik, cloud etc.
* Erfarenhet av S/4HANA
* Förmåga att arbeta i team och leverera projekt i tid och inom budget
* Driven att utveckla expertkunskaper hos dig själv, kollegor och kunder
* Vilja att arbeta som konsult inom en dynamisk bransch där du tar stort eget ansvar
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift

#### **Vad vi erbjuder**

Välkommen in i en dynamisk organisation som präglas av entreprenörskap, innovation och en stark gemenskap. Vi tror på att mångfald och ha kul på jobbet gör oss mer effektiva och kreativa. Hos oss får du tillgång till ett unikt nätverk av erfarna kollegor, spännande uppdrag och kunder. Med över 20 års erfarenhet hjälper vi svenska och internationella företag att skapa effektiva och hållbara affärsprocesser. Vi har kontor på 10 orter i Sverige, 300 medarbetare, och omsätter 500 MSEK.


Du blir en del av vår kultur som levererar gemenskap och kul, alltifrån årlig konferens, skidresor och sociala initiativ som kvinnligt nätverk, träningsaktiviteter, quizkvällar och grymma AW's. Vi erbjuder dessutom förmåner så som löneväxling, utbildningsbudget, friskvård och hybridarbete.


#### **Vad mer kan du förvänta dig?**

Personlig utveckling står högt på vår agenda, därför anpassar vi projekt efter person för att säkerställa en stadig kurva uppåt i din utveckling. Vi tror på att stötta varandra och skapa en öppen kultur där tankar och idéer alltid är välkomna. Tillsammans skapar vi ett ännu bättre Implema där du spelar en viktig roll!

title: Palo Alto-konsult – Cybersäkerhet och Infrastruktur
description:
Vi söker en erfaren Palo Alto Networks-specialist som vill vara med och stärka vårt team. Som konsult får du en unik möjlighet att arbeta med marknadsledande säkerhetslösningar och bidra till utvecklingen av robusta och resilienta IT-miljöer hos våra kunder.


Conscia har den högsta partnernivån Palo Alto Diamond Innovator, vilket innebär att vi arbetar med affärskritisk infrastruktur och säkerhet i komplexa miljöer. Nu utökar vi vårt team och letar efter dig som är nyfiken, teknikdriven och som vill växa tillsammans med oss.

 **Om oss**


Conscia levererar lösningar inom **nätverk, automation, cybersäkerhet** och **observabilitet** till kunder med verksamhetskritisk IT-infrastruktur. Våra certifierade konsulter designar, implementerar, supporterar och driver innovativa, skräddarsydda IT-lösningar som hjälper våra kunder i deras dagliga verksamhet och teknologiska utveckling.


Vi arbetar i teknikens framkant och uppmuntrar ständigt både kunder och medarbetare till kontinuerligt lärande och innovation. Hos oss har du stora möjligheter att påverka din egen utveckling och vi satsar stort på kompetensutveckling.


Välkommen till Conscia – Network of Knowledge!

 **Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter:**


Som Palo Alto-konsult kommer du att hjälpa våra kunder att designa, installera och optimera Palo Alto-plattformen. Du kommer att arbeta i projektformat med kunder från olika branscher för att utforma lösningar som möter deras unika behov. Du kommer bland annat att:

* Designa, implementera och administrera Palo Alto Strata och Panorama (Next-Generation Firewalls och centraliserad säkerhetshantering).
* Implementera och optimera Cortex XDR för avancerad hotdetektion och respons.
* Designa och implementera Prisma Access (SASE/SSE) för att säkra användar- och applikationsåtkomst i hybrid- och molnmiljöer.
* Genomföra säkerhetsanalyser, riskbedömningar och rekommendera förbättringsåtgärder.
* Agera rådgivande åt våra kunder och säkerställa en robust säkerhetsarkitektur.
* Hålla workshops och presentationer tillsammans med kunder.
* Avancerad incidenthantering och analys.

 **Kvalifikationer och erfarenhet**


Vi ser gärna att du:

* Har minst 5 års tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta med Palo Altos produkter och plattform.
* Djup kunskap inom Palo Alto Strata, Panorama, Cortex XDR och Prisma Access.
* Erfarenhet av nätverkssäkerhet, Zero Trust-arkitektur och proaktiva säkerhetsstrategier.
* Kunskap inom molnsäkerhet och hybridmiljöer (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) är en fördel.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och i team, med god kommunikationsförmåga gentemot kunder.
* Behärskar svenska och engelska mycket väl i tal och skrift.


Certifieringar såsom PCNSE (Palo Alto Networks Certified Network Security Engineer) eller motsvarande är meriterande. Samt erfarenhet av Cortex Cloud Security för att säkra hybrid- och molnmiljöer.

 **Personliga egenskaper**


Du gillar att hålla dig uppdaterad om ny teknik och har ett genuint intresse för personlig utveckling. Du är positiv, ser möjligheter, tar ansvar och kan arbeta självständigt. Du är konsultativ, och vill alltid hjälpa till. Du är trygg i din roll som rådgivare, och du vill arbeta i en miljö där det är självklart att man delar med sig av sin kunskap till kunder och kollegor.

 **Om tjänsten/Vi erbjuder**


En möjlighet att arbeta med marknadsledande säkerhetslösningar i spännande kundmiljöer.


Ett dynamiskt team med hög kompetens och starkt engagemang för cybersäkerhet.


Kontinuerlig utbildning och möjlighet att utvecklas inom Palo Alto Networks ekosystem.


Flexibla arbetsformer och en inspirerande arbetsmiljö.


Fast lön och bonus enligt överenskommelse.T


Tjänsten är på heltid.


Du behöver bo i Sverige och vi ser gärna att du utgår från ett av våra fem kontor, men arbetet kommer även att ske hos våra kunder.  



  

Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!


Har du frågor om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till Lill Lindbäck, konsultchef på telefonnummer 076-116 69 58 eller via mail på lill.lindback@conscia.com. Ansökan görs via länken här i annonsen. Vi tar in kandidater löpande.

title: Internship: Information Security Specialist (Fall 2025)
description:
**Location:** Hybrid or Remote

**Duration:** Fall 2025, minimum of 8 weeks


Are you ready to jump into the exciting and dynamic world of information security? Alva Labs is looking for a motivated and curious interns to join our Information Security team this fall. This is a fantastic opportunity to gain hands-on experience, work directly with our CIO, and help protect the integrity of a platform used by companies around the world.

### **The company**


Alva Labs was founded in 2017 and offers a digital candidate assessment solution that helps over 600 companies worldwide drive more accurate and efficient hiring processes. Our platform provides Talent Acquisition Managers, Recruiters, and Hiring teams the insights to make confident and efficient hiring decisions while delivering a high-quality candidate experience. At the same time, we provide candidates with the means to demonstrate their full potential to employers.


Security is at the core of what we do—our mission to modernize recruitment is deeply tied to safeguarding our platform and users’ data. This internship will allow you to dive into meaningful security projects and contribute directly to making our systems safer and more robust.

### **What You’ll Do**


As an **Information Security Intern**, you’ll work closely with our CIO and operations team, focusing on real-world security challenges. Your tasks will vary based on your interests, but they could include:

* **Security process improvements:** Analyze and refine our existing security protocols to enhance system resilience.
* **Compliance and risk management:** Assist in managing compliance requirements and assessing risk areas across our systems.
* **Hands-on IT-security work:** Solve practical challenges related to IT-security in a cloud-based architecture.
* **Data protection and privacy:** Contribute to safeguarding user data with best practices in data protection.


We are also looking for an **IT Project Management Intern** to join at the same time or in overlapping periods. While your primary focus will be security-related work, there will be opportunities to collaborate, share insights, and support each other on projects that connect **information security and IT process management**.


You’ll have regular mentorship meetings and support from experienced team members to ensure your learning is impactful and engaging. This is a fast-paced environment where your ideas and efforts will be valued.

### **About You**


We’re looking for someone who is curious, eager to learn, and ready to take initiative. You don’t need to be an expert—interest and curiosity go a long way. We’ll provide the tools, support, and guidance you need to thrive.

**What we’re looking for:**

* Currently enrolled in a **YH-education program** (sv. *yrkeshögskola*) or a similar educational pathway that includes a mandatory internship component, ideally with a focus on Information Security or IT Security with a internship period of 8 weeks minimum.
* Proactive, curious, and willing to take ownership of tasks.
* A passion for information and IT-security.
* Comfortable working in a collaborative and fast-moving team.
* Fluency in English, no need to speak Swedish for this position.

### **What We Offer**

* **Practical experience:** Work on impactful projects tied to real-world security challenges.
* **Tailored learning:** Pick the projects and tasks that excite you the most.
* **Supportive mentorship:** Receive regular feedback and guidance from experienced security professionals.
* **Impactful work:** Contribute directly to protecting user data and improving security systems.
* **Growth environment:** Be part of a high-paced SaaS company that values learning and innovation.

### **Your future colleagues**


We are in total a team of 70ish people, representing 18 (!) different nationalities and a wide selection of professional backgrounds. And all of that is absolutely fantastic, but the true beauty is the trust and warmth you will experience. You will most likely never feel so supported and have so many brilliant brains to learn from and ask for guidance. To quote our CEO during our last company trip: “It feels like hanging out with a bunch of old friends”.

### **Why join Alva?**


The problem we are solving is not just engaging and interesting (the combination of Psychological Science and statistics with a large chunk of candidate experience obsession – what’s not to love…?), but it is also something that has a tremendous impact on both people and businesses. You will have the opportunity to work with something that truly makes a difference.


With 600+ customers, strong growth, happy users, and above 1 000 000 assessed candidates, there is a lot of greatness to build on. We are on an exciting phase of our company journey.


What’s more? We have a hybrid approach, so working from home or at the office (or remotely within Europe) is your choice. You decide for yourself what works best for you.

### **The process**


Does this sound like the perfect fit for you? We’d love to hear from you!



* Objective screening with Alva’s own tests


* Case survey


* First interview


* Final interview


* Done deal!



Take the first step toward an exciting career in information security—join us at Alva Labs and make an impact!

title: Snowflake Architect
description:
Job Vacancy: **Snowflake Architect**

Location: **Sweden**

  

Contract: **B2B, Full-Time**

### **Company Overview:**


Kolomolo is a globally recognized tech enterprise dedicated to delivering state-of-the-art digital solutions. As we expand our operations, we are on the lookout for seasoned Snowflake Architect

### **Roles & Responsibilities:**

* Manage multiple Snowflake Accounts, preferably using multiple Cloud Providers
* Understand Snowflake Usage, Manage Warehouses and setting appropriate resource monitors
* Understand Role Based Access Control, best practices regarding Snowflake Roles setup and access patterns
* Understand and Setting up Snowflake Secure Data Share, Data Consumers and Partner Connect
* Create Replicated databases, demonstrate Database Replication and Database Failover/ Failback
* Implement and Explain improvements in Public and Private Preview features to all users
* Communicate and manage Snowflake releases, in case of any features being deprecated in monthly releases

### **Qualifications and skills:**

* A minimum of 6+ years of progressively responsible experience in Computer Science, IT, programming/systems analysis, or other related experience required
* 6+ years of data warehousing and relational database experience (Snowflake, Oracle, or PostgreSQL)
* Experience in managing multiple Snowflake Accounts, preferably using multiple Cloud Providers
* Understanding Snowflake Usage, Manage Warehouses and setting appropriate resource monitors
* Understand Role Based Access Control, best practices regarding Snowflake Roles setup and access patterns
* Understanding and Setting up Snowflake Secure Data Share, Data Consumers and Partner Connect
* Create Replicated databases, demonstrate Database Replication and Database Failover/ Failback
* Implement and Explain improvements in Public and Private Preview features to all users
* Communicate and manage Snowflake releases, in case of any features being deprecated in monthly releases
* Strong programming skills in SQL, Shell Scripting and Python
* Experience in AWS and Cloud Technologies in General with Knowledge of data warehousing concepts
* Minimum of 2 years supervisory experience or cross-functional or delivery team lead experience required
* Ability to interact with senior internal and external personnel on technical matters
* Demonstrated problem solver with the ability to provide technical solutions to a wide range of complex data-related problems
* Knowledge of project and system development methodologies, especially Agile
* Knowledge of operating systems, relational database architectures, query languages and interface, standard programming environments, data integration tools, application integration solutions, and web-based information solutions
* Excellent written and oral communication skill at all levels
* A Bachelors’ or Masters’ degree preferably in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business Administration or other related field required
* Prior vendor management experience preferred
* Ability to manage and prioritize multiple projects simultaneously

### **Personal Qualities:**

* Ability to interact with senior internal and external personnel on technical matters
* Demonstrated problem solver with the ability to provide technical solutions to a wide range of complex data-related problems
* Excellent written and oral communication skill at all levels
* Ability to manage and prioritize multiple projects simultaneously

#### **WHAT WE OFFER:**

* Competitive salary and benefits
* A dynamic, collaborative, and growth-oriented work environment
* Opportunities for career advancement and continuous learning
* Flat management structure
* B2B contract
* A chance to be part of something bigger where what you say matters
* Agile ways of working
* Fun and relaxed working environment where work-life balance is important
* Regular company events (time for fun)
* Office in Krakow (High quality coffee / Tea / Fruits / Sweets)
* Ability to work alongside young, motivated, eager to learn and talented team

### **ABOUT US:**


Kolomolo, a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services, is looking for a **Snowflake Architect** **.**


While Kolomolo is a pillar of strength, we shatter the corporate mold. Think agile teams, generous autonomy, and a remote & asynchronous ethos.


We're also big on work-life harmony, inspired by Scandinavian values.


Curious?


Dive deeper into Kolomolo's Career Portal.

### **WHAT MAKES USE DIFFERENT?**


We prioritize learning and development, and we recognize and reward hard work and intelligence. We treat our staff with respect and trust, giving them responsibilities and seldom checking up on them. We prefer agile ways of working, minimizing unnecessary management and bureaucracy.


Our team is made up of passionate and knowledgeable individuals who love what they do and are always eager to help each other. But it's not all work and no play at our company!

 **We believe in a healthy work-life balance and foster a fun and inclusive culture.**

  

Join us and be part of a dynamic team that encourages continuous learning, rewards hard work, and values a fun and inclusive work culture. Take your career to new heights with us as, where you'll have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, align your work with your passions, and be part of a team that truly values your contributions.


Apply now and let's embark on an exciting journey of learning, achievements, and camaraderie together!

 **Cheers to a fulfilling and rewarding career with us!**

title: Client Delivery Manager - nyce.logic
description:
**At Extenda Retail, we empower businesses with innovative solutions that transform logistics and retail. NYCE.LOGIC, our advanced Warehouse Management System (WMS), enables businesses to optimize their supply chain with cutting-edge technology, automation, and real-time insights.**

  

We are looking for a Client Delivery Manager to lead the successful implementation and delivery of NYCE.LOGIC WMS solutions for our global clients. In this role, you will drive software implementations, ensuring that our clients achieve maximum value from our platform. From proof of concept to full-scale SaaS deployments, you will oversee projects of varying complexity.


As Client Delivery Manager, you will be responsible for planning, coordinating, and ensuring the smooth execution of deliveries across development teams—both in-house and through global partners.


**Previous Experience**

  

You probably bring 5+ years of project management experience, ideally within a product-centric, agile environment. Experience with cloud-based software deliveries is highly advantageous. You should be comfortable taking a holistic view of the delivery and also have a strong commercial mindset and understanding of the business aspects of software deliveries. Experience as a service manager responsible for continuous delivery of maintenance, support, and enhancements will also help you in this position as maintaining the quality and service levels for existing products to the clients is an important aspect of this role.

**Responsibilities**

* Plan and execute implementation projects with NYCE.LOGIC WMS.
* Manage client expectations, relationships, and overall satisfaction throughout the project lifecycle.
* Ensure successful delivery within budget, scope, and timeline..
* Monitor financials, project schedule, and scope to keep delivery on track.
* Coordinate and align multiple teams to ensure seamless integration and deployment.
* Proactively identify, manage, and mitigate risks, issues, and dependencies, collaborating with teams, clients, and stakeholders.
* Apply WMS best practices and methodologies, assessing risks in processes, people, and technology, and adjusting plans accordingly.
* Lead and facilitate status meetings with teams and stakeholders, ensuring transparency and alignment.
* Continuously drive improvements in ways of working through inspection, adaptation, and optimization.
* Foster a collaborative, open, and transparent project environment.
* Maintain proactive communication with clients and key stakeholders, ensuring alignment and engagement.

**Skills And Experience**

* 5+ years of project management experience, delivering WMS or supply chain software solutions from inception to deployment.
* Strong ability to manage client-facing projects with a focus on warehouse management and logistics solutions.
* Excellent communication skills, with the ability to tailor messages to different audiences.
* Demonstrated leadership skills across technical, commercial, and interpersonal aspects.
* Experience in Agile software delivery methodologies.
* Background in professional services, consulting, or enterprise software implementation.
* Highly analytical and data-driven approach to decision-making.
* University degree in Computer Science, Supply Chain Management, or equivalent experience.
* Strong understanding of software development processes and warehouse operations.


Sounds interesting? Do you have what it takes? Be sure to apply as soon as possible.

**Location**


Gothenburg

title: Full-Stack Engineer
description:
**Full-Stack Engineer – Join Us at Yazen Health!**


Are you an experienced Full-Stack Engineer looking to make a real impact? Yazen Health is on a mission to revolutionize obesity treatment through personalized, data-driven healthcare solutions. Our platform combines medical expertise, behavioral science, and advanced technology to help patients achieve sustainable weight loss and better health. As a rapidly growing startup, we're expanding across Europe—and we want you to be part of our journey!

### **About Yazen Health**


At Yazen Health, we believe in compassionate, patient-centered care. Our small, dynamic team works across multiple areas, from patient apps and journal systems to content creation. We prioritize action over words and are looking for individuals who thrive in an environment that values autonomy, initiative, and collaboration. If you’re passionate about making a difference in healthcare and enjoy solving complex problems, we’d love to meet you!

### **Your Role**


As a Full-Stack Engineer at Yazen Health, you will:

* Collaborate with designers, developers, product managers, and data specialists to create full-stack solutions aligned with our mission.
* Build and maintain both front-end and back-end features, ensuring a seamless user experience.
* Work closely with designers to implement precise, pixel-perfect interfaces.
* Lead code reviews, write tests, and continuously improve software quality.
* Explore and implement new technologies to enhance development efficiency.
* Troubleshoot and resolve software issues with a patient-first mindset.

### **Our Tech Stack**

* **Front-end:** React, React Native, Expo
* **Back-end:** Firebase, Node.js
* **Tools & Platforms:** GitHub, Google Cloud Platform (GCP)

### **What We Value**

* A strong passion for improving patient care through technology.
* Adaptability in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment.
* A proactive, hands-on approach with a focus on fast execution and continuous learning.
* Strong communication skills, especially in remote and asynchronous settings.
* A collaborative mindset and experience working in cross-functional teams.
* Comfort with using data analysis to drive decisions and improvements.

### **What We’re Looking For**

* Experience working with React and Node.js (React Native and Firebase are a plus).
* Strong knowledge of modern JavaScript, TypeScript, and CSS.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and adaptability.
* Strong interpersonal and communication abilities.
* Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and prioritize tasks.
* Residency in Sweden is a plus but not required (valid work permit needed).

### **What Makes You Stand Out**

* You thrive in a dynamic environment where you can take initiative and contribute ideas.
* You care deeply about the quality of your work and its impact on users.
* You enjoy working collaboratively and continuously growing in your role.
* You’re excited to be part of a mission-driven team that’s improving lives through healthcare innovation.

### **What We Offer**

* A mission-driven work environment where your contributions make a real difference.
* Opportunities for remote work, with a team that values flexibility and open communication.
* Continuous professional development with access to the latest tools and technologies.
* The chance to be part of an innovative healthcare scale-up shaping the future of obesity treatment.

### **How to Apply**


Interested? Upload your CV and tell us why you’re excited to join Yazen Health. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: People and Capability Leader - SAP Tech
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.**

* **Do you see the potential in people and have a strong track record as a people manager?**
* **Do your clients and colleagues see you as an advisor where you always bring your best in leveraging SAP finance solutions to achieve business objective?**

**If you’re motivated by playing a crucial role in growing our SAP Finance to Manage capability in the Nordics and further develop our people, please read on. You may be the one we’re looking for!**  



**YOUR ROLE**
-------------

**Capgemini are seeking a dynamic and experienced People Manager to lead the SAP Finance to Manage team in Stockholm.** **You will be a part of a Nordic capability team and the role will be combined with presales, delivery activities and people manager responsibility.**  

  

**As a leader you develop our SAP consultants within the Finance and controlling domain to ensure that our people and business grow, and that we bring world class SAP Finance capabilities to our clients.**  



***In this role, you will play a key role in:***
================================================

* **Driving team performance through effective utilization management, performance evaluations, and competence development**
* **Leading, mentoring, and motivating a team of senior and junior SAP finance consultants to grow and deliver exceptional results**
* **Fostering a collaborative and inclusive team environment, promoting open communication and knowledge sharing**
* **Being an advisor for our clients around financial processes, identifying areas for improvement, and developing SAP solutions to address their specific needs**
* **Collaborating with sales and presales teams to develop winning strategies and deliver compelling proposals to clients**
* **Collaborating with project teams to ensure SAP solutions are integrated seamlessly with existing systems and business processes**
* **Executing on company strategy to drive business growth and expansion**
**YOUR PROFILE**
----------------

* **Bachelor's or Master's degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field**
* **A strong entrepreneurial spirit and thrive in building and developing our business**
* **Strong people leader skills with the ability to inspire and motivate both senior and junior team members**
* **Proven experience in SAP Finance and in-depth knowledge in SAP S/4 HANA**
* **Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively interact with clients and internal stakeholders**
* **Proven experience in successful end to end SAP implementations**
* **Fluency in English is a must; Swedish is a plus**

**About Capgemini**

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world while creating a tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries.**  

  

**With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market-leading capabilities in AI, cloud, and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.**

**Get The Future You Want |** **www.capgemini.com**

The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.**

title: Relationsbyggande Säljare B2B
description:
Vill du vara en del av en energifylld arbetsmiljö där sammanhållning och gemenskap står i fokus? Som Säljare för B2B erbjuder vi en spännande möjlighet för dig som brinner för försäljning att att ta nästa steg i karriären!
  
  

Ditt nya jag, i vårt lag
  
  

Vi på Telesales Företag är ett sammansvetsat team som fokuserar på att skapa starka och långvariga relationer med våra kunder, samtidigt som vi arbetar mot tydliga mål. Vi tillhandahåller Tres mobila lösningar till både befintliga och nya kunder och du kommer aktivt att bygga och hantera din egen kundbas för att säkerställa återkommande kunder. Vi ser till att du får alla förutsättningar och verktyg för att utvecklas i din roll som säljare, med kontinuerlig coaching och utbildning.
  
  

Några av våra medarbetare
  
Julia Maxén
  
Gruppchef
  
"Jag vill att mitt team ska få de bästa förutsättningarna för att göra sitt jobb på bästa sätt. Det är så vi utvecklar oss som team, men även utvecklar Tre framåt."
  
Henrik Sundvall
  
Digital projektledare
  
"Det absolut bästa med att vara projektledare på Tre är jag får jobba brett med kollegor från alla delar av organisationen och få lära mig nya saker varje dag. Jag har friheten att vara mig själv – och bli uppskattad för det!"
  
Jayasri Battola
  
Utvecklare
  
"The great work culture and the technology made me choose Tre. Working alongside great people in mixed team setups, with both experienced and new talents, along with the latest and greatest tools and technologies like Cloud and Azure."
  
  

Vi söker dig
  
  

Som har tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta med försäljning och brinner för att skapa meningsfulla relationer. Du värdesätter samarbete och tar stort ägandeskap i dina arbetsuppgifter. Vi tror på att skapa en balans mellan service och skicklig försäljning, och vi värdesätter din förmåga att framgångsrikt bygga starka och långvariga relationer. Hos oss är det driv och vi söker dig som delar vårt fokus på mål.
  
  

Vi erbjuder dig
  
  

En gedigen introduktion och löpande utbildning för att ge dig de bästa förutsättningarna att lyckas i rollen.
  
En tillsvidareanställning på heltid (måndag till fredag) med grundlön, obegränsad provisionsmöjlighet och en attraktiv kvartalsbonus.
  
En roll på en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser där vi sätter våra medarbetare i fokus samt att vi är stolt samarbetspartner till Women in Tech och Tjejer Kodar.
  
En företagskultur vi är mycket stolta över, som inkluderar roliga tävlingar, aktiviteter och awards.
  
En möjlighet att vara en del av att leverera kritisk infrastruktur och bidra direkt till samhällsnyttan.
  
  

Välkommen med din ansökan!
  
  

Vi tar emot ansökningar via denna annons och kommer hålla intervjuer löpande. Personligt brev behövs inte, men vi vill gärna att du svarar på några frågor vi ställer i samband med att du söker. Vi använder tester för att säkra objektiva bedömningar i samband med urval. Tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Bakgrundskontroll genomförs på slutkandidat.
  
  

Vi har riktigt bra förmåner
  
  

Friskvårdsbidrag, föräldrarlön, pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal
  
  

Flexibla helgdagar och fem dagar extra ledigt per år
  
  

Hundzon & gym i 3huset
  
  

Subventionerad lunch
  
  

Förmånliga rabatter på cyklar, kollektivtrafik och elbilar
  
  

Generösa bonusmodeller eller provisioner
  
  

Vi drivs av att hela tiden försöka göra saker bättre, på nya och annorlunda sätt. Vi ser oss själva som en avgörande del av Sveriges samhällsstruktur, eftersom vi vet att pålitlig uppkoppling är en viktig grundsten i dagens digitala värld.
  
  

Tre föddes som utmanare och är en organisation i ständig rörelse. Vi strävar efter att vara i framkant i allt vi gör. Vi är övertygade om att det är människorna och kulturen på Tre som är avgörande för vår utveckling.
  
  

När du startar din resa på Tre finns det oändliga möjligheter att växa och utvecklas med oss.
  
  

WE THINK LIKE CHALLENGERS - I en föränderlig värld, är vi på Tre nyfikna och ständigt öppna för nya lösningar. På Tre anpassar vi vägen framåt allt eftersom vi provar och lär oss vad som funkar bäst.
  
  

WE WORK LIKE CHAMPIONS - På Tre gör vi alltid vårt bästa. Vi känner ägandeskap för vår uppgift, sätter tydliga mål och håller fokus på det som gör mest nytta för affären.
  
  

WE ACT LIKE BUDDIES - På Tre är vi schyssta kollegor. Vi samarbetar med varandra över team och funktioner, vi bollar idéer, ger och tar emot feedback.
  
  

2003
  
Tre först i Sverige med videosamtal och strömning av mobil video. Att se personen som du ringer upp i ögonen är en helt ny upplevelse vid den här tidpunkten.
  
  

2006
  
Tre lanserar mobilt bredband som tredje operatör i världen. Under de kommande fem åren vinner Tre pris för Sveriges snabbaste mobila bredband.
  
  

2013
  
Tre’s systerbolag Hallon startas med en vision att vara den enkla mobiloperatören utan onödigt krångel.
  
  

2019
  
Ett händelserikt år! 3Världen lanseras som innebär att kunder kan surfa i 80 länder till samma pris som inom Sverige. Därefter lanseras 3Samla som gör att alla kunder kan lägga till fler användare till sitt abonnemang och sist men inte minst är Tre först i Sverige med ett lansera ett publikt 5G-nät.
  
  

2025
  
Tele2 Arena byter från 1 januari namn till 3Arena. Med vår starka passion för innovation, uppkoppling och upplevelser ska vi medverka till arenans och områdets utveckling.
  
  

Mireille Senghore | Kontaktperson

Tre

title: AI Architect
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**


Within BCSS SA BOS Engineering PDU D&A, the mission of the Development Group Artificial Intelligence (DG AI) unit is to enable the BSS and OSS product and service portfolio with AI features, with a special focus on the Ericsson Telco IT AI Apps. It includes creating innovative solutions using the latest AI technologies, leading towards an AI-native BSS and OSS portfolio. DG


AI is also responsible for spearheading the use of AI in software development inside BOS Engineering and developing, deploying, and operating Ericsson internal AI tools (e.g., AI-driven troubleshooting).

 **What you will do:**


Reporting to the Head of DG AI, this role is pivotal in aligning AI solutions with business objectives, designing scalable AI architectures, and fostering collaboration across various teams. We would love to hear from you if you are passionate about cutting-edge AI technologies and thrive in a collaborative environment.

* Business Alignment: Translate business goals into actionable AI solutions, ensuring models deliver tangible business value.
* Architecture Design: Define the overall AI software system architecture, focusing on Generative AI-based systems and incorporating modern software engineering practices and cloud-native principles.
* Scalability and Efficiency: Design AI systems capable of handling large data volumes and scaling efficiently in production environments.
* Team Collaboration: Collaborate closely with data scientists, software engineers, and other stakeholders to integrate ML models into applications and systems.
* Technology Evaluation: Stay updated with advancements in AI algorithms, frameworks, and cloud platforms to identify suitable technologies for projects.
* Leadership and Mentorship: Guide and mentor team members on AI best practices and development methodologies.

 **The skills you bring:**

* 10+ years of experience in software development, with at least 3+ years in AI systems engineering.
* Experience in Gen AI-based system engineering, including MLOps, LLMOps, RAGOps, including hands-on experience with LLMs, embedding models, LLM Orchestration frameworks (e.g. Langchain), and Agentic frameworks (e.g., LangGraph).
* Strong programming skills in Python.
* Experience with cloud platforms, especially AWS.
* Thrives on accountability and is motivated to achieve beyond expectations.
* Collaborative mindset, with the ability to work effectively as part of a team.
* Authentic, courageous, and inspiring technical leadership.
* A customer-first mindset, proactively embedding this approach within the team.
 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Karlskrona
